BABL.summary: Buildablock Corp. operates as an Internet and mobile service platform. The company addresses a need in social networking, and concentrates on the neighborhood as the origin point. It also operates DealWink engine, an e-commerce platform that combines group buying, couponing, and price aggregation. The company, through its proprietary model of consumer-directed group buying, allows consumers to decide what products they wish to receive deals on through a simple click and post method. It also provides automated tools that negotiate the deal on behalf of the consumer to maximize the group deal. Buildablock Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

KITS.TO.summary: Kits Eyecare Ltd. operates a digital eyecare platform for eyes in the United States and Canada. It offers contact lens products, glasses, and sunglasses, as well as virtual try-on and pupillary distance measurement and online vision test services through its websites and mobile platform. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

M5BQ.F.summary: Namaste Technologies Inc. engages in the online sale of medical cannabis, cannabis products, and accessories worldwide. It operates CannMart.com, a cannabis store that provides medical customers with various hand-picked products from licensed cultivators; NamasteMD, a telemedicine application that connects medical clients with health care practitioners to issue and renew medical cannabis authorizations online; and Findify, an e-commerce artificial intelligence machine learning application, which optimize and personalize consumer's on-site buying experience. The company also distributes licensed and in-house branded cannabis and cannabis derived products to recreational consumers in Canada through various provincial government control boards and retailing bodies, as well as facilitates licensed cannabis retailer sales online in Saskatchewan. Namaste Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

MIMI.V.summary: Mimi's Rock Corp. operates as an online dietary supplement and wellness company that markets and sells its products under the Dr. Tobias, All Natural Advice, and Maritime Naturals brand names. Its products include colon 14-day cleanse and omega 3 fish oil; adult multivitamin; deep immune probiotics and prebiotics; vitamin D3; turmeric curcumin; all-in-one dog chews; and skin and beauty care products. The company operates in the United States, Canada, and Europe. The company is headquartered in Oakville, Canada.

It operates CannMart.com, a cannabis store that provides medical customers with various hand-picked products from licensed cultivators; NamasteMD, a telemedicine application that connects medical clients with health care practitioners to issue and renew medical cannabis authorizations online; and Findify, an e-commerce artificial intelligence machine learning application, which optimize and personalize consumer's on-site buying experience. The company also distributes licensed and in-house branded cannabis and cannabis derived products to recreational consumers in Canada through various provincial government control boards and retailing bodies, as well as facilitates licensed cannabis retailer sales online in Saskatchewan. Namaste Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

NEXCF.summary: NexTech AR Solutions Corp. engages in the acquisition and development of augmented reality (AR) technology. The company offers ARitize eCommerce, the browser-based and Web enabled AR shopping platform; NexTech University, an app-based solution that allows companies and educational establishments to leverage their existing 2D assets and overlay immersive 3D-AR experiences on top of that content for an interactive training experience; NexTech Studios for branded entertainment and immersive 360 experiences; NexTech 3D/AR-360, an end-to-end solution; and ARitize360 that gives customers an interactive experience by transforming their products into AR models, as well as CaptureAR, an AR technology that makes 3D augmented reality creation accessible. In addition, the company sells vacuum cleaners and parts through retail stores and online sales channels; and health supplements for animals through online sales channels. NexTech AR Solutions Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.

PLTXF.summary: Vegaste Technologies Corp. operates plant-based community. Its PlantX is the one-stop-shop for plant-based that offers pre-made meals and indoor plant deliveries. The company also focuses on offering its product lines to include cosmetics, vitamins, clothing, and its own water brand. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
